org.apache.arrow.memory

Interface AllocationListener


  • public interface AllocationListener
    An allocation listener being notified for allocation/deallocation

    It is expected to be called from multiple threads and as such, provider should take care of making the implementation thread-safe

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static AllocationListener NOOP 

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void onAllocation(long size)
      Called each time a new buffer is allocated

    • Field Detail

      • NOOP

    • Method Detail

      • onAllocation

        void onAllocation(long size)
        Called each time a new buffer is allocated
        Parameters:
        size - the buffer size being allocated
